# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(0, 0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) and a wooden chest at position (1.5, 0.5). The furnace is currently smelting copper plates but is limited by fuel.

### Copper plate mine at position(-15, -50)
Consists of a burner mining drill at position (-15.0, -50.0), a burner inserter at position (-14.5, -51.5), and a wooden chest at position (-15.5, -51.5). The inserter transfers mined iron ore from the drill to the chest. The drill is currently mining iron ore, but the chest is filling up. There is also a burner inserter at position (-13.5, -49.5) which is trying to insert items into a steel chest at position (-12.5, -49.5)

### Chest storage area near copper mine
Consists of multiple chests at the following locations:
